entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
